name: CBT-i Coach
description: CBT-i Coach is for people who are engaged in Cognitive Behavioral Therapy for Insomnia with a health provider, or who have experienced symptoms of insomnia and would like to improve their sleep habits. The app will guide you through the process of learning about sleep, developing positive sleep routines, and improving your sleep environment. It provides a structured program that teaches strategies proven to improve sleep and help alleviate symptoms of insomnia.  CBT-i Coach is intended to augment face-to-face care with a healthcare professional. It can be used on its own, but it is not intended to replace therapy for those who need it.  CBT-i Coach is based on the therapy manual, Cognitive Behavioral Therapy for Insomnia in Veterans, by Rachel Manber, Ph.D., Leah Friedman, Ph.D., Colleen Carney, Ph.D., Jack Edinger, Ph.D., Dana Epstein, Ph.D., Patricia Haynes, Ph.D., Wilfred Pigeon, Ph.D. and Allison Siebern, Ph.D. CBT-i has been shown to be efficacious for insomnia for both Veterans and civilians.  CBT-i Coach was a collaborative effort between VA‚Äôs National Center for PTSD, Stanford School of Medicine, and DoD‚Äôs National Center for Telehealth and Technology.

The Anti-Depression program will help you solve the following problems: ‚Ä¢ bad mood, loss of interest in usual activities, ‚Ä¢ apathy and lack of energy, ‚Ä¢ sleep disorders (insomnia, problems falling asleep) ‚Ä¢ loss of meaning in life, ‚Ä¢ low self-esteem (thoughts ‚ÄúI haven‚Äôt achieved anything‚Äù, ‚ÄúI can‚Äôt do anything‚Äù, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm worse than others‚Äù, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm a complete loser‚Äù, etc.) ‚Ä¢ reluctance to communicate, desire to isolate from others. name: Thrive: sa√∫de mental digital
company: INTC - Instituto de Neur. e Terapias Cog. LTDA
description: Thrive will help you to fight your depressive symptoms and face moments of sadness, anxiety and irritability. It is the first application in Brazil for depression based on cognitive-behavioral therapy, considered, scientifically, one of the most effective psychotherapeutic approaches for these cases. You will have access to several strategies to face your difficulties, achieving emotional, behavioral and cognitive changes that will reflect in your daily life, improving your mood, your personal relationships, academic, professional performance, etc.  Thrive is also an excellent ally for those who are being followed up with a psychologist or psychiatrist, and can be used as a support tool in their care.  At Thrive, you'll find: 1. Psychoeducation: educational content, with important information about depression, sadness, anxiety and other mental health topics. You will also have access to several quizzes, where you can test and consolidate the knowledge acquired; 2. Monitoring: space designed to monitor your emotions, energy, hours of sleep and time of physical activity. Realizing and recording daily how your emotions vary over the days is the first step in overcoming your symptoms. From there, you will be able to identify the circumstances and thoughts related to your emotions. 3. Behavioral Activation: Select pleasurable activities from a wide list of suggestions, planning a weekly schedule with your favorite activities and monitoring your emotions regarding your behaviors. You can customize your activities according to your interests and skills, balancing fun activities with activities of responsibility and personal fulfillment. This strategy is of recognized importance in the treatment of depression; 4. Thoughts: record and question your thoughts. This technique, known as cognitive restructuring, will help you to identify possible distortions of thoughts, making it possible to question them and insert more functional mental schemes, appropriate with reality data. This will contribute to the relief of unpleasant emotions, as you will perceive your experiences in a more functional and adaptive way; 5. Tools: you will have access to several other strategies to experience your emotions, including diaphragmatic breathing exercise, muscle relaxation, coping cards, anti-procrastination exercise, gratitude diary, among others. Also, you can count on scales of symptom assessment that will assist in monitoring your progress.  The search for a psychologist or psychiatrist is not always accessible to everyone. Specialized professionals may not be available in your region, may be expensive, or you may not be motivated to undergo therapy. Thinking about it, the psychiatrist Dr. Ives Cavalcante Passos, and the psychologists Dra. Analysis de Souza Vivan and Dra. Daniela Tusi Braga got together to develop the most complete application you will find to fight depression. This is a highly qualified team, with important academic and clinical performance. You are not alone on this journey! We care about you and will be on the other side of the screen, monitoring and assisting you in your evolution.  The most suitable cognitive-behavioral therapy techniques are now in the palm of your hand.  Download THRIVE and prosper!

name: CBT Diary App
description: If you are in cognitive behavioural therapy this application definitely is for you. CBT Diary App helps you in your CBT therapy every day, day by day. With this application you can record events, your thoughts, emotions and behaviors, analyse them on charts and send reports to your therapist. Because the CBT Diary App is on your mobile, you have your diary always with you. You will never forget to take. You can take notes anywhere, any time.  Application generates clean and tidy pdf report. This report can be shared with your doctor.  With CBT Diary App you can: - record events, thoughts, emotions and behaviors - track emotions on charts - list, edit, delete notes you have wrote - generate reports about events, thoughts and emotions and send it to your therapist - customise list of emotions you want to track.  CBT therapy is effective for a variety of conditions, including mood, anxiety, personality, eating, addiction, dependence, tic, and psychotic disorders.  All functions are available for a certain period of time. After this time, some functions will be disabled. To turn all features back on, you can purchase a 3-month, 1-year, or 3-year license.

name: TELUS Health CBT
description: What is CBT?  CBT is Internet-based Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT). CBT is effective and commonly used for a variety of mental health concerns. ‚ÄòC‚Äô is for cognitive and refers to what and how we think. ‚ÄòB‚Äô is for behavioral or how we act. Cognitive-Behavioral is about the relationship between our thoughts, emotions, and behaviors.  Those thoughts, emotions, and behaviours connect to our moods, our physical experiences, and events in our lives. Being aware of how negative thoughts about an event or experience might be affecting how we act, or perceive a situation, can change our emotional, behavioural and physical responses to it.  TELUS Health CBT is CBT delivered by a therapist through an app. Combining a personalized therapist-guided program with digital tools and exercises to bring CBT to life wherever and whenever needed.  Mobile access. Therapy that meets you where you are.  Digital therapy means easy access available 24/7 from any mobile device making it easy to incorporate therapy into your daily life without the additional time and travel requirements of in-person therapy.  Supported by a trained CBT therapist  Every program includes a dedicated CBT therapist who will review all of the work and activities in the program. The therapist will guide the treatment plan accordingly, which may mean suggesting new activities or revisiting modules. The therapist is also available through via messaging to offer feedback and support.  Interactive exercises and activities  Each module contains activities, videos and assignments to help you learn, develop and practice new skills. Activities are seen by your therapist who will review and provide direction and support.  How it works  All programs will start with a clinically validated screening which assesses for depression, anxiety, substance abuse, mania, sleep, and other mental health conditions.  The therapist will review the screening results to create a personalized program.  Each program contains a series of modules that follow an established CBT framework: assessing your current state, education and lessons, skill building, reinforcement and reassessment. The therapist will guide you throughout by reviewing and providing feedback on all exercises and modules. When you are ready the therapist will make the next module available in your program.

name: WorryTree: Anxiety CBT Therapy
description: ** Named best CBT app ** by Marie Claire ** Featured in well + good ** ** Featured in The Guardian **  WorryTree is a self-help tool that helps you identify your worries, challenge them, and reform your thoughts. The process is powered by CBT or Cognitive Behavioural Therapy, also known as the Worry Tree technique.  Using our app, you can learn about your negative thoughts, discover different ways to manage anxiety, stress or panic and feel better.  This is the clearest, easiest-to-use CBT therapy app available today, where you can practice the Worry Tree technique.  ‚≠ê What Can You Do With WorryTree App ‚≠ê  ‚úîÔ∏è Manage stress and anxiety using the CBT technique ‚úîÔ∏è Practice CBT anywhere alongside your therapy ‚úîÔ∏è Record and download your worries and show them to the therapist ‚úîÔ∏è Set reminders of your action plans to manage worries ‚úîÔ∏è Find ways to extract yourself from negative thoughts ‚úîÔ∏è Create a personalised action plan for each worry  ‚≠ê WorryTree: Anxiety CBT Therapy Features ‚≠ê  ‚úîÔ∏è Get started for Free ‚úîÔ∏è Mobile-friendly, convenient user-interface ‚úîÔ∏è Self-help stress management tools powered by evidence-based strategies ‚úîÔ∏è Access blogs, tutorials and webinars ‚úîÔ∏è Options to change the theme: System, Light, Dark ‚úîÔ∏è Calendar, Daily Notification, and other reminders ‚úîÔ∏è Progress tracker ‚úîÔ∏è Also available in Spanish  ‚≠ê Deal with your worries  Find out what thoughts make you anxious with this app. WorryTree presents an effective way of challenging your negative thoughts by creating action plans. Categorise your worries, create custom action plans to manage them and learn to change your thoughts.  ‚≠ê Bring positive changes  Consistent practice of CBT brings positive change in your mental health. WorryTree is the perfect tool for practising CBT therapy daily. We have options to send several reminders to keep you on track. Turn on reminders to follow your action plan and feel better than ever.  ‚≠ê Practice gratitude  WorryTree helps you identify the good in your life and show your gratitude. Set reminders to practice gratitude and unlock the ‚Äúfeel good‚Äù vibes.  ‚≠ê Built by worriers for worriers  WorryTree was founded by Louise, who was diagnosed with Generalised Anxiety Disorder a few years ago. She had to undergo a series of Cognitive Behavioural Therapy sessions to manage her issues. Her sessions encouraged her to share the power of CBT with the world and make it easy to access from anywhere. No wonder WorryTree is a revolution that was built by worriers for worriers.  Along with generalised anxiety disorder, people suffering from panic attacks, social anxiety, and stress might also benefit from CBT. WorryTree works like a guided journal to track your thoughts and emotions, manage your worries, offer anxiety help, encourage self-reflection and stress relief/anxiety relief and improve your mental health.  ‚ù§Ô∏è To practice CBT and feel better, install WorryTree now.  You can read our Terms and Conditions in full at https://worry-tree.com/terms-conditions.  Please note:  WorryTree is not a substitute for professional mental health care, therapy or advice. If you're concerned about any aspect of your mental health or someone else's, you should always approach a professional, such as a qualified therapist or your GP.

name: Marbles CBT
description: Marbles CBT is an easy-to-use app for learning and practicing tools from CBT therapy. Whether you have tried it or not, you can use it to change your habits and thinking patterns and feel better. Marbles includes several tools, including:  Thought challenging - negative feelings often arise from our thoughts about situations and events in life. Cognitive behavioural therapy teaches us to identify such thought patterns that are not logical, called "cognitive distortions." In Marbles, the process of challenging thoughts is structured: recording the thought, identifying distortions, challenging the thought, and creating an alternative thought. The tool and various distortions are also covered in short lessons.  Overcoming fears (using exposures) - CBT is highly effective for dealing with specific fears such as: fear of heights, claustrophobia, fear of animals, social anxiety, etc. As part of the treatment, exposure exercises are used to gradually deal with the scary subject. The Marbles app enables you to create a central practice table and to keep track of every practice you do. Self-monitoring diary - one of the main CBT tools, it is a diary that allows you to examine the relationship between your thoughts, feelings, and behaviors in different situations. Through it, you learn how your thoughts and behaviors affect your emotions.  Slow breathing - The practice of slow breathing is an easy and highly effective method for relaxing the body. For beginners and experienced practitioners alike.  Muscle relaxation - a simple relaxation technique that relieves physical and mental stress, anxiety, and even pain. Marbles contains illustrated instructions for practicing relaxation at all levels.  Mood diary - for recording changes in mood over time. In addition, you can choose accompanying emotions and add comments. In the insights screen, you can see the changes in mood over time.  Additional features include:  ‚Ä¢ Insights screen with mood graph, your most common emotions, and activity data. ‚Ä¢ Follow up on thoughts relating to future events (did what you expect really happen?). ‚Ä¢ A learning section with short lessons on CBT, app features, and usage tips. ‚Ä¢ Share all your content easily - you can attach your diaries and exercises in an email (convenient for therapists).  Subscription  All the main features of the app are completely free to use. We offer a premium subscription to keep the core tools of the app free. These include: additional diaries, insights, and relaxations. The premium subscription also allows us to spend more time and budget upgrading Marbles and adding new features.  A subscription may differ in price by country. Payment will be deducted from a user's Playstore account at the time of purchase. Subscriptions will automatically renew 24 hours before they expire unless cancelled in advance.  Disclaimer  It is important to remember that Marbles CBT is not meant to replace professional mental health help, therapy, or counselling. If you have concerns about any aspect of your mental health, or someone else's mental health, it is always advisable to seek professional help.

name: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy -
description: You may find techniques to introspect mental disorders and evidence-based information about emotional problems and mental disorders. It will also teach you how to test yourself for psychological problems. By identifying your problems, you can bring discipline to your life. ¬† Cognitive Behavioral Therapy does not exist as a distinct therapeutic technique. The term "Cognitive Behavioral Therapy" is a very general term for a classification of therapies with similarities. There are several approaches to cognitive behavioral therapy, including Rational Emotive Behavior Therapy. ¬† Cognitive-behavioral therapy is an approach used by psychotherapists to influence a patient's behaviors and emotions. The key to the approach is in its procedure which must be systematic. It has been used successfully to treat a variety of disorders including eating disorders, substance abuse, anxiety, and personality disorders. It can be used in individual or group therapy sessions and the approach can also be geared towards self-help therapy.‚Ä®‚Ä® ¬† The effectiveness of the treatment can clearly be judged based on its results. The more it is used, the more it has become recommended. It is now used as the number one treatment technique for post-traumatic stress disorder, obsessive-compulsive disorder, depression, and bulimia. ¬† CBT is effective for a variety of conditions, including mood, anxiety, personality, eating, addiction, dependence, tic, and psychotic disorders. Many CBT treatment programs have been evaluated for symptom-based diagnoses and been favored over approaches such as psychodynamic treatments. However, other researchers have questioned the validity of such claims to superiority over other treatments. your knowledge, widen your expertise, improve your practice skills, Broaden your academic & career horizons. ¬† ¬† * Features: ¬† - Periodic update of content‚Ä® - Support Offline Database ‚Ä® - You can ask questions from our experts‚Ä®. - Send us your suggestions and we will add them. ¬†

name: MindShift CBT - Anxiety Relief
description: MindShift CBT: Manage Anxiety with Evidence-Based Tools  Important Update: MindShift CBT will be closing soon. After March 31, 2025, MindShift will no longer receive updates or support, and all user data will be permanently deleted. Users will need to manually remove the app from their mobile devices.  MindShift CBT is a free, evidence-based self-help app using Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) strategies to help manage anxiety, stress, and panic. Users can challenge negative thoughts, track progress, practice mindfulness, and access coping tools, including belief experiments, fear ladders, and guided meditations.  Features include a daily check-in, goal setting, coping statements, relaxation exercises, and a Community Forum for peer support.  MindShift CBT provides practical, science-backed strategies to support anxiety management and overall well-being.

name: Quieting Anxiety: CBT Tools
description: Previously Stop Panic & Anxiety Self-Help, now Quieting Anxiety‚Äîsame tools, new name!  Learn about the methods used to manage panic and get relief from anxiety. Relaxation, mindfulness, and teaching audios. Mood log and analysis, cognitive diary, healthy goals & more!  Feel hopeful about changing your life! Learn about the cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT) methods shown in psychological research to be effective in managing panic and anxiety.  What's Inside: 1) Quieting Anxiety Podcast ‚Ä¢ Learn CBT techniques and how to apply them ‚Ä¢ Pairs with interactive app features.  2) Assistance audios ‚Ä¢ Learn to tolerate and manage panic and anxiety ‚Ä¢ Panic Assistance -- coaches you through a panic attack ‚Ä¢ Mindful Grounding -- teaches you how to refocus during high anxiety ‚Ä¢ Mindful Breathing  3) Dozens of other audios ‚Ä¢ Guided Imagery -- relaxation ‚Ä¢ Quick Stress Relief -- simple exercises ‚Ä¢ Mindfulness ‚Ä¢ Emotion Training -- can be used simply as relaxation or you can use them to learn how to manage emotions ‚Ä¢ Muscle Relaxation ‚Ä¢ Children's Relaxation ‚Ä¢ Mindfulness Training ‚Ä¢ Energizing ‚Ä¢ many of the articles are also available in audio format  4) Tests ‚Ä¢ To help you learn about yourself ‚Ä¢ Cognitive Styles Test, Your Happiness Assessment and more  5) Cognitive Diary ‚Ä¢ Step by step evaluation of an event that caused distress ‚Ä¢ To help with cognitive restructuring  6) Healthy Activities Log ‚Ä¢ track daily activities to motivate and make improvements  7) Mood Log ‚Ä¢ record your moods throughout the day ‚Ä¢ mood analysis feature: shows your average mood ratings for different actions or events ‚Ä¢ graphs to track your mood  8) Daily Goals ‚Ä¢ to plan your healthy activities ‚Ä¢ treatment planning with therapist  9) Qi Gong Videos ‚Ä¢ a gentle, physical relaxation method  10) Articles ‚Ä¢ about panic/anxiety ‚Ä¢ explaining cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT)  The tools provided in this app are derived from the CBT research base and developed into a user-friendly format by Dr. Monica Frank, a clinical psychologist specializing with the cognitive-behavioral treatment of anxiety disorders for over 30 years.  About cognitive-behavioral therapy  Quieting Anxiety by Excel At Life teaches you how to use the cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT) methods in a simple format.  Learn the CBT methods shown by decades of psychological research to be effective for changing your emotions/moods and behavior that contribute to depression, anxiety and stress, as well as problems in relationships, career and physical health.  These CBT methods can be used as self-help for minor issues or can be used in collaboration with your therapist to develop a treatment plan best suited to your situation. The Daily Goals feature can be used to record your plan and completed activities.  Other features  ‚Ä¢ All personal data stored in your device. ‚Ä¢ Download audios for offline use. ‚Ä¢ Fully customizable: change the CBT terms (beliefs and definitions) used in the diary to conform with the system you are familiar with, add your own challenging statements for each belief, add moods/emotions, add healthy activities to track ‚Ä¢ Password protection (optional) ‚Ä¢ Daily reminder (optional) ‚Ä¢ Examples, tutorial, articles ‚Ä¢ Email entries and test results - useful for therapeutic collaboration  This app provides education to be an informed consumer of mental health services and contains resources to use in collaboration with a health professional. Prior to using CBT methods you should consult with your physician as sometimes panic and anxiety may be related to a physical condition.

name: MindHealth: CBT Mental Health
description: Our Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) App ‚Äî is your personal psychotherapist in a mobile format, designed for everyone aiming to improve their mental health and psychological well-being.  üîç Psychological Tests  Currently, diagnostic tests are available for various psychological issues such as depression, eating disorders, neurosis, and ADHD. After completing these tests, you can create your own psychological profile and monitor its progress over time.  Our psychological tests are developed considering modern methods in psychiatry and psychotherapy. After taking the tests for depression and anxiety, you will receive feedback and recommendations from qualified psychotherapists. These tests are your first step towards anti-depression and enhancing your mental health.  üìì Popular CBT Techniques  - CBT thought diary (cbt journal) ‚Äî a primary tool of cognitive behavioral therapy. The diary consists of 9 steps, helping you identify and work through your cognitive distortions. - Daily Diary ‚Äî record your thoughts freely with analysis and recommendations from AI. - Coping Cards ‚Äî note down your destructive beliefs in coping cards format and work through them conveniently.  üìò Studying Psychology  We have developed a series of interactive courses on topics such as depression and mental health. Thanks to our educational materials, you will understand the basic principles of CBT and learn how to work properly with a thoughts diary.  Learn what terms like: panic attack, emotional intelligence, positive thinking, burnout, adhd, eating disorder (ED), and others mean.  ü§ñ AI Psychologist Assistant  Throughout your journey, your personal AI psychologist will accompany you. It will suggest the best exercises based on your condition and help rephrase negative thoughts.  üìä Mood Tracker  Twice a day, you can assess your mood and note predominant emotions. This way, you can track changes in your well-being and maintain a mood diary.  The mood tracker is an incredibly effective tool for anxiety. Using it in conjunction with psychological tests and a mood diary will help to track the dynamics of the condition and improve mental health.  Depression, neurosis, anxiety, burnout, panic attacks ‚Äî unfortunately, these issues are familiar to everyone. That is why we started developing our product. Our goal is to create the best self-help app on the market.  We position the app as "your personal psychologist" for self-help. Our AI assistant will support you on the challenging path to psychological health.  In addition, you will find affirmations and reflective questions in the app. You can share your experiences with others.  Our methods are based on proven principles of cognitive behavioral therapy, one of the most effective psychotherapy methods.  With our app, everyone can become their own psychotherapist, gain self-confidence, improve mental and psychological health, and overcome anxiety disorders and depression. name: Jealousy CBT Tools Self-Help
description: Signs of Irrational Jealousy ‚Ä¢ Are you overly suspicious of your partner? ‚Ä¢ Do you question your partner excessively? ‚Ä¢ Do you check up on your partner? ‚Ä¢ Do you need frequent reassurance? ‚Ä¢ Does your jealousy cause anger directed at your partner? ‚Ä¢ Is your relationship being harmed by your jealous behavior? ‚Ä¢ Is your jealousy not based on evidence? ‚Ä¢ Is it, in fact, contrary to the evidence?  Improve Yourself - Improve Your Relationship Jealousy CBT Tools by Excel At Life teaches you how to use the cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT) methods in a simple format to learn how to manage irrational jealousy. The tools provided in this app are derived from the CBT research base and developed into a user-friendly format by a psychologist with over 30 years of clinical experience.   CBT tools included in this app  1) Assistance audios ‚Ä¢ Jealousy Assistance -- coaches you through a jealous episode ‚Ä¢ Mindful Grounding -- teaches you how to refocus during intense emotions ‚Ä¢ Mindful Breathing ‚Ä¢ Managing Anger  2) Tests ‚Ä¢ to help you learn about yourself ‚Ä¢ Why Are You Jealous Test? Provides information about fears that cause irrational jealousy: fear of inadequacy, fear of feeling bad, fear of loss of ego, fear of loss, fear of being hurt, and fear of vulnerability. ‚Ä¢ Cognitive Styles Test, Your Happiness Assessment and more  3) Articles ‚Ä¢ When Is Jealousy Irrational? ‚Ä¢ What to Do When Your Jealousy Threatens to Destroy Your Marriage ‚Ä¢ Jealousy: When the Damage is Done ‚Ä¢ Rejection Sensitivity, Irrational Jealousy, and Impact on Relationships ‚Ä¢ and more  4) Cognitive Diary ‚Ä¢ step by step evaluation of an event that caused distress ‚Ä¢ to help with cognitive restructuring  5) Daily Goals & Healthy Activities Log ‚Ä¢ plan and track daily activities to motivate and make improvements ‚Ä¢ treatment planning with therapist  6) Mood Log ‚Ä¢ record your moods throughout the day ‚Ä¢ mood analysis feature: shows your average mood ratings for different actions or events ‚Ä¢ graphs to track your mood  7) Dozens of audios ‚Ä¢ Guided Imagery -- relaxation ‚Ä¢ Quick Stress Relief -- simple exercises ‚Ä¢ Mindfulness ‚Ä¢ Emotion Training -- can be used simply as relaxation or you can use them to learn how to manage emotions ‚Ä¢ Muscle Relaxation ‚Ä¢ Mindfulness Training ‚Ä¢ many of the articles are also available in audio format  8) Qi Gong Videos ‚Ä¢ a gentle, physical relaxation method  About cognitive-behavioral therapy Learn the CBT methods shown by decades of psychological research to be effective for changing your emotions/moods and behavior that contribute to depression, anxiety and stress, as well as problems in relationships, career and physical health.  These CBT methods can be used as self-help for minor issues or can be used in collaboration with your therapist to develop a treatment plan best suited to your situation. The Daily Goals feature can be used to record your plan and completed activities.   Other features  ‚Ä¢ All personal data stored in your device. ‚Ä¢ Fully customizable: change the CBT terms (beliefs and definitions) used in the diary to conform with the system you are familiar with, add your own challenging statements for each belief, add moods/emotions, add healthy activities to track, change colors of app ‚Ä¢ Password protection (optional) ‚Ä¢ Daily reminder (optional) ‚Ä¢ Examples, tutorial, articles ‚Ä¢ Email entries and test results - useful for therapeutic collaboration

name: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy
description: Do you want to find a solution to emotional problems? Cognitive behavior therapy app is developed as a tool for introspection of mental illness. All of us have an innate ability to respond involuntarily to different stressors and anxieties of life .and the complexity of life which is suggested by the fundamental problem of all mental illnesses. Don't worry there is a way to get out of all emotional dis-balance.  There are many benefits to Cognitive Behavioral Therapy. Some of the most common include:  - CBT can help people learn how to better control their thoughts and emotions, which can help them feel more in control of their lives.  - CBT is often effective at treating anxiety and depression, as well as other mental health issues.  - CBT has been shown to be a very cost-effective treatment option for many people.  - CBT can help people learn how to problem solve and cope with difficult life situations.  - CBT can help people learn how to self-regulate their emotions and manage stress.  - CBT can help people learn how to develop healthy relationships.  In this app, you may find techniques to introspect mental disorders and evidence-based information about emotional problems and mental disorders. It will also teach you how to test yourself for psychological problems. By identifying your problems, you can bring discipline in your life.  What You Will Get In This App:  ‚Ä¢ What is Cognitive Behavior Therapy ‚Ä¢ What is Cognitive-Behavioral Therapy (CBT)? ‚Ä¢ At-home Cognitive Behavioral Therapy for Anxiety ‚Ä¢ Learn about Cognitive Behavioral Therapy and Therapists ‚Ä¢ Cognitive Behavioral Therapy for Insomnia ‚Ä¢ What Is Cognitive Behavioral Therapy? ‚Ä¢ Cognitive Behavioral Therapy for Depression ‚Ä¢ Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) for Negative Thinking ‚Ä¢ In-Depth: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy ‚Ä¢ Behavioral Therapy: Definition, Types, and effectiveness ‚Ä¢ Lots More‚Ä¶  Hopefully, cognitive behavioral therapy will help you to bring change in your life. If you like these details share it with your friends.

name: FreeCBT
description: FreeCBT is an open source thought diary for Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT).   Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) is the "gold standard" of psychotherapy and is widely considered to be one of the most effective, evidence backed treatments for depression, anxiety, and panic. If you go into just about any therapist or psychiatrist, CBT will likely be one of the first treatments they try.   FreeCBT is a companion and self-help app for one of the most common formats of CBT. You may have heard it called "the three column technique" or "catch it, check it, change it." Your brain is really good at making you feel exactly what you're thinking. Often, we find ourselves thinking "automatic negative thoughts" that lead us to fume on something that may not be true. That can cause us to feel depressed or anxious.   CBT helps you record "automatic thoughts," challenge them with cognitive distortions and then train your brain with an alternative thought. If you do it enough, you can change your thoughts, your moods and your behavior.   FreeCBT, a fork of Quirk, is open source under the GPL. You can find the code on Github at: https://github.com/erosson/freecbt

name: Cognitivy. CBT Journal
description: Your mood and emotions are a reflection of your thoughts. With Cognitivy, you will be able to recognize the beliefs behind your emotions and work through them in an easy-to-use format. ‚ú® Keeping a cognitive diary is one of the core tools in modern psychotherapy, including CBT and REBT. Regularly working with your thoughts helps shift your perception, improve your mood, and create positive changes.  The app allows you to:  ‚≠ê Understand your emotions: Choose emotions from convenient categories ‚Äî negative and positive, divided into subgroups. This will help you identify your feelings more accurately and begin working through them.  üåø Identify and record the thoughts behind those emotions: Make entries in free-form or use the structured format recommended in REBT. Focus on types of thoughts such as demands, catastrophizing, low frustration tolerance, and depreciations.  üí° Identify cognitive distortions: Detect and challenge distortions that skew your perception of reality and affect your well-being.  ‚ö° Challenge all thoughts at once: A unique feature of the app ‚Äî challenge all negative thoughts simultaneously, allowing you to work through complex situations comprehensively.  üå± Track your reactions: Monitor your physiological and behavioral responses to better understand how your thoughts influence your behavior.  üöÄ Use hints and learn along the way: Built-in tips will help you get acquainted with the app and deepen your understanding of how to work with your thoughts and emotions.   Start writing down your situations, reactions, emotions, and thoughts in Cognitivy. Challenge old, ineffective beliefs and begin your journey toward positive change.

name: Mosaik: CBT therapy journal
description: If you're suffering from stress, low self-esteem, anxiety, or depression, if you find yourself overwhelmed by your thoughts and emotions, or are simply in search of more serenity and well-being: you're in the right place.  Mosaik brings together everything you need to clarify your thoughts and emotions with self-therapy programs, relaxation techniques, meditations, and therapeutic writing guides developed with three psychologists.  A CHALLENGE A DAY  Each day, Mosaik offers you 5 challenges to take care of your mental health, covering multiple themes and involving a variety of tools: meditation, breathing, self-therapy session, sports, writing, etc.  Every day, take 5 to 10 minutes to meet your challenge and step by step move towards a more serene and calm mind.  SELF-THERAPY PROGRAMS  Our Mosaik self-therapy programs have been designed with three psychologists.  They guide you in taking care of your mental health, giving you all the necessary keys to better understand and manage your thoughts and emotions.  Our programs are based on CBT (Cognitive Behavioral Therapy) and ACT (Acceptance and Commitment Therapy), therapies recognized for their effectiveness against anxiety and depression.  RELAXATION TECHNIQUES  Mosaik offers several tools to help you relax and release all the tension in your body.  Numerous scientific studies have shown the effectiveness of the breathing techniques that inspire Mosaik's relaxation sessions in combating anxiety.  Guided breathing sessions are also offered to help you take control of your breath and use this powerful natural weapon for relaxation.  MINDFULNESS MEDITATION  Mosaik offers meditation and visualization sessions to regain control over your attention and reconnect with yourself.  Several themes are available depending on your current needs and desires.  Our meditations and visualizations immerse you in a bubble of gentleness and calm.  GUIDED INTROSPECTION JOURNAL TO FEEL BETTER  Keeping a journal is one of the best ways to free your mind of harmful thoughts and stay on track with your goals.  Not sure what to write? No worries! Mosaik offers several hundred templates and questions tailored to your needs to guide you in your reflections.  The templates are inspired by CBT and ACT, therapies recognized for their effectiveness in soothing your mind, calming your anxiety, combating depression, having healthier relationships, developing your self-esteem, etc.  TRACKING TOOLS  Keep track of your progress, set up new routines, and win trophies to celebrate your advancement. Earn points by taking care of your mental health and watch the plant that accompanies you grow as you take action!  WHAT HAPPENS TO MY DATA?  We take your privacy and the security of your data very seriously. We commit to never transmitting your data to other apps or any third party.  HOW TO CONTACT US?  We are available to answer all your questions by email at hello@mosaik.care.  Terms and Conditions: https://www.mosaik.care/conditions-generales  Privacy Policy: https://www.mosaik.care/politique-de-confidentialite

name: Chakra Healing & Meditation
description: What is Chakra Meditation Balancing?  We created this app to help you balance your 7 Chakras. Chakras are energy centers located through your physical body.The most important ones are seven, and they influence your life flow.  In order to live a balanced life, you must maintain your Chakras in constant balance. When one of them is closed, the others will compensate by opening up more and this will create unbalance in your body, as well as unbalance in your spirit.  How to Balance your Chakras?  Each Chakra is associated with different colors and different sounds. Certain tones can tune your Chakras and allow energy to flow through them.  The same can be done with certain wave frequencies. This app was devised and studied to help you tune your Chakras through meditation. Just tap once the buttons and a soft tune related to that Chakra will start. Tap again to stop it.  We put a lot of passion in creating this app, so that everyone can enjoy it and use it to improve their spiritual life. For a better experience and to truly enjoy the high quality of the music, we recommend using headphones instead of speakers.  *Chakra Meditation Balancing includes* - 7 HIGH QUALITY tunes, specifically created for each of the 7 most important Chakras - A detailed information page on each of the Chakras, useful to remind what energy centers of the body they influence, their location and their name. Now you can choose whether to log your timer sessions to the Health app as "Mindful Minutes". - The screen will change color once you select a specific Chakra, aiding you in your meditation.  This 7 Chakra Meditation for Body Healing and Cleansing app will help you to perform chakra activation and manage your energy within your body. This app includes all 7 chakra meditations audio and 3 special categories;  1. Root Chakra 2. Sacral Chakra 3. Solar Plexus Chakra 4. Heart Chakra 5. Throat Chakra 6. Third Eye Chakra 7. Crown Chakra 8. 7 Chakra Meditation 9. Chakra Meditation Collection 10. Chakra Meditation Handbook  What are chakras?  A chakra is a Sanskrit word that means wheel. In yoga and meditation, the chakras are wheels or discs located all over the body. There are seven main chakras aligned with the spine. They start from the base of the spine and move in a straight line, along the spine, through the crown. When energy flows unobstructed through these energy centers, your body, mind, and soul will appreciate the coordination and good health. Any obstruction to this flow could harm your overall well-being.  How does chakra healing work?  A series of major and minor energy centers - called chakras - exist in the body. The chakras are the energy centers of the physical body, where your beliefs and emotions are transformed into your state of health.  What are the benefits of healing the chakra?  Healing through the chakra is said to be able to cure almost any mental illness or disease. The process restores balance for each of the chakra sites, as it is believed that if the chakra has too much or too little energy, it will not function properly. The East Indian philosophy behind the healing of the chakras states that body and mind are connected and that a healthy body is a body in which the energies associated with each chakra are balanced and in harmony.  Here are some reviews for Chakra Meditation Balancing:  ‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢ This app is very beautiful and the music has so much relaxation in it. It's a peaceful app (from Jayy Anne)  ‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢ Perfect!! Quick timed meditation at my finger tips!!! Great for travel or the office (from Momanator)  ‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢ After I downloaded the App, I started listening to the sounds just to hear what it sounds like. By the time I got to the fifth sound from the top I was in a deep meditative state. I was overwhelmed with happiness, love and joy. I also became grateful for everything in life. Thank you (from Marko_Ras)  Thanks to everybody, we are working to make Chakra Meditation Balancing even better!Ôºå

name: Borderline Personality Test
description: Borderline personality disorder is a mental health condition characterized by difficulty managing emotions and behavior, a pattern of unstable relationships, and self-image issues. Individuals with borderline personality disorder often engage in self-harm and deal with feelings of emptiness, fear of abandonment, and depersonalization.  Borderline Personality Disorder is commonly associated with other mental health conditions such as depression, eating disorders, and substance abuse.  BPD can typically be treated with evidence-based psychotherapy such as Dialectical Behavior Therapy (DBT).  This test uses the Maclean Screening Instrument for BPD - a series of 10 yes or no questions corresponding to different symptoms for Borderline Personality Disorder.  Disclaimer: This test is NOT a diagnostic test. A diagnosis can only be provided by a qualified healthcare professional. Please consult a physician or mental health professional if you are concerned about Borderline Personality Disorder.  Zanarini, M. C., Vujanovic, A. A., Parachini, E. A., Boulanger, J. L., Frankenburg, F. R., & Hennen, J. (2003). A screening measure for BPD: The McLean screening instrument for borderline personality disorder (MSI-BPD). Journal of personality disorders, 17(6), 568-573.

description: Feeling overwhelmed by borderline personality disorder? Take control with the most comprehensive BPD tracker and borderline personality disorder app.  You are not alone. Our BPD diary helps you discover patterns and triggers with the help of a quick daily check-in.  Want to share it with your doctor? No problem, just generate a printable report! Want to track something more? Just add it as a custom symptom or treatment!  FOR PEOPLE WHO WANT TO: - Track borderline personality disorder symptoms daily - Monitor mood swings and emotional patterns - Use a BPD tracker alongside DBT or CBT therapy - Keep a private BPD diary for self-reflection - Share progress with their healthcare team - Understand their borderline personality disorder better  HOW THIS BORDERLINE PERSONALITY TRACKER HELPS  Our BPD tracker was designed to make monitoring borderline personality disorder simple and effective. Track mood changes, relationship dynamics, and BPD symptoms in one secure place. Add custom symptoms specific to your borderline personality disorder experience and see patterns emerge over time.  KEY FEATURES OF YOUR BPD DIARY:  Track & Monitor: - Daily mood and feelings - Borderline personality disorder symptoms - Treatments and medications - Personal notes and reflections - Custom symptoms unique to your BPD  Analyze & Understand: - Easy overview of how you're doing - Statistics over time - Mood swing patterns - Symptom frequency - Treatments  Share & Collaborate: - Create PDF reports for your doctor - Track therapy homework and DBT skills - Monitor medication effects - Prepare for appointments  Stay Consistent: - Daily reminders for your BPD diary - Achievement system for motivation - Secure with biometric authentication  PERSONALIZE YOUR BORDERLINE PERSONALITY TRACKER  Every borderline personality disorder journey is unique. Customize your BPD tracker by: - Adding your specific symptoms - Creating custom treatments - Setting personal reminders - Tracking what matters to you  TRACK WHAT IMPACTS YOUR BPD: - Emotional intensity levels - Relationship dynamics - DBT and CBT skill usage - Anxiety and depression alongside BPD - Sleep and energy patterns - Triggers and coping strategies - Medication adherence - Therapy insights  PRIVATE & SECURE BPD DIARY  We value your privacy. Your borderline personality tracker entries are just yours, only accessible on your device.  SIMPLE YET COMPREHENSIVE  Created for real people managing borderline personality disorder. We know BPD can make everything feel overwhelming, so we kept our tracker simple while including everything you need for effective monitoring.  PERFECT FOR: - Borderline Personality Disorder (BPD) - Mood tracking and journaling - Mental health monitoring - Therapy support tool - Medication tracking  GET STARTED WITH YOUR BPD TRACKER  Whether you're newly diagnosed with borderline personality disorder or have been managing BPD for years, this tracker adapts to your needs. Start your borderline personality diary today and gain insights into your patterns, triggers, and progress.  Consult with your doctor if you are experiencing any symptoms of an illness. This software is not a replacement for a medical treatment. It is intended for informational purposes only and comes with no warranty. You can read the terms of use and privacy policy here: http://adamcziko.com/borderline-personality-tracker-privacy-policy-and-terms-of-use/

name: DBT Coach : Guided Therapy
description: This is the most comprehensive app for Dialectical Behavior Therapy (DBT) that exists today with easy-to-follow visual tools.  Learn and practice DBT skills using video lessons and fun animations which help you to remember skills longer. Features over 100 videos and 200+ animations. You can also take notes on these lessons for future use.  User-friendly diary card for skills and target behaviors. Summary screens to check your progress. Analytics to get insight into your own behavior as you learn new skills. Ability to share with therapists and care team.  Track your progress on how you are doing and get motivated to obtain new skills. Get awards for tasks done towards obtaining new skills or keeping up with one you already know.  Complete exercises and practice ideas that are similar to worksheets in actual DBT skills training. There are over 100 exercises. You can also see a history of all the exercises that you did in the past to compare. Each of the exercise link directly to lessons.  Over 1000 meditations ranging across multiple themes from some of the best teachers in the world.  Favorites list to save skills and meditations you use frequently.  Crisis survival list to manage your crisis.  Community tools such as Discussion Groups and Peer Support Groups help you practice and share knowledge about DBT Skills.  Finally, the app integrates with a clinician app. If your therapist is signed up and you are set up to share your diary card and exercises, then you don‚Äôt have to share via email every week. Your therapist can engage with you in real-time.  Dialectical behavior therapy (DBT) treatment is a type of psychotherapy ‚Äî or talk therapy ‚Äî that utilizes a cognitive-behavioral approach. It began with efforts to treat borderline personality disorder (also known as Emotional Instability Disorder). DBT has been conceptualized as a treatment broadly applicable to individuals with difficulties regulating emotions. Empirical evidence now supports the use of DBT adapted for eating disorders, substance use disorders, and PTSD.  Payment will be charged to your Playstore account at confirmation of purchase *You have a choice of being billed monthly for $11.99/month or a discounted price of $59.99 every six months. ‚Ä¢ Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period ‚Ä¢ Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal ‚Ä¢ Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase ‚Ä¢ Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. name: Integrate BPD

Key Features:  1. Step-by-step Process: Progress through thoughtfully designed modules that guide you in understanding and healing the core injury in BPD, distorted perceptions, and maladaptive behaviors.  2. Self-Paced Learning: Engage with the content at your own pace, allowing for a flexible therapeutic journey.  3. With Integrate BPD, embark on a journey towards a more integrated and stable self, transforming how you perceive and interact with the world.

name: BPD Insight and Awareness App
description: The BPD Insight and Awareness app is an essential resource for gaining a more thorough, fact-based understanding of borderline personality disorder. This comprehensive app provides a wealth of information and resources for individuals affected by BPD, along with loved ones, family members, and friends.  It begins with an in-depth description of BPD and the nine BPD symptoms. A historical overview of the disorder is presented, tracing its origins in 1938, when Adolf Stern first introduced the term "borderline," up to May of 2008, when the US House of Representatives recognized May as National BPD Awareness Month.  In addition to presenting content on the symptoms, treatments, and possible causes of the disorder, the app presents dozens of brief pieces of original content on aspects of BPD that don't get enough attention‚Äîthings like the difficulty people with BPD have with "object constancy," "identity disturbance," and "emotional reasoning." Whenever possible, the content is written using plain, non-clinical language.  There is a considerable emphasis in the app on DBT (dialectical behavioral therapy), including its origin in the 1970s when Marsha Linehan developed it. The app provides a detailed explanation of DBT and how it differs from other types of psychotherapy. In addition, the four essential skills of DBT are explained not only in writing but also with DBT skills sheets and video presentations.  This app provides access to some of the most popular BPD blogs and links to the most reputable sources of information on BPD, such as NEABPD, NIMH, NAMI, and more. It includes powerful mindfulness meditation videos created specifically for individuals with BPD, multimedia presentations, audio tracks, inspiring music, famous BPD quotes, and powerful affirmations.  The app includes three BPD self-assessments commonly used in the diagnosis of BPD, including the highly regarded McLean Screening Instrument for Borderline Personality Disorder (MSI-BPD) and the lesser-known BSL-23  This app will present information on BPD using clear, intelligible language and provide information thoughtfully and sensitively, with an emphasis on hope and recovery.  The BPD Insight and Awareness App includes:  An Introduction from the Developer A Definition and Description of BPD A Detailed Explanation of the Nine Symptoms of BPD The Cause of BPD as Represented in the Biosocial Theory An Explanation of DBT, or Dialectical Behavioral Therapy The statistics on BPD, including prevalence, co-occurring disorders, and recovery The Four BPD Subtypes The McLean Screening Instrument (MSI-BPD) for BPD The Borderline Symptom List (BSL-23) Assessment for BPD The Nine-Question BPD Symptom Assessment BPD and Fear of Abandonment BPD and Identity Disturbance BPD and Comorbid Anxiety Understanding Benign Interpretation Understanding Emotional Regulation Childhood Event Linked to BPD The History of BPD Understanding Self-Compassion Recognizing BPD in Men The Stigma Associated with BPD The Realities of Living with BPD Hollywood's Depiction of BPD Loving Someone with BPD BPD and Self-Injury The Pain of Living with BPD Emerging Treatments for BPD Downloadable DBT Skills Worksheets Downloadable BPD Skills Worksheets Quick BPD Coping Techniques Video Meditations for BPD DBT Skills Videos Video Interviews with BPD Treatment Specialists (Borderline Notes) An Open Letter to People Who Don‚Äôt Have BPD 101 Positive Affirmations for Fighting Self-Injury Inspired Quotes About BPD Playlist of Inspiring Songs for Those with BPD How to Create a BPD Crisis Plan Getting Help from the 988 Crisis Lifeline Five Must-Read Books on BPD Access to the Most Popular BPD Blogs In addition, the app includes a bookmark feature and a personal notebook.  Disclaimer: This app is intended to be a source of information for those wishing to understand BPD. This app is not a substitute for professional counseling or treatment by a qualified mental health practitioner.

name: DBT Central
description: DBT Central is your all-in-one app for getting DBT skills, DBT training and a Care Companion solution for your team. Whether you‚Äôre looking to manage emotions, reduce stress, improve relationships, or dive deeper into DBT training, we‚Äôre here to support you every step of the way.  What you‚Äôll find:  Personalised Skills Programs: Self-paced, Guided, and Intensive DBT subscription pathways tailored to your schedule and learning style.  Live Skills Groups (Launching May 2025): Join weekly online sessions with real-time Q&As and on-demand coaching.  Scalable, Comprehensive Training Solution: From beginners to advanced externships, we offer training for individuals, practitioners, and clinical teams.  Clinical Pathways (Available June 2025): Use structured virtual care pathways, electronic diary cards, and 200+ Patient Reported Outcome Measures to streamline care.  Live Workshops and Events: Deepen your skills with interactive training and workshops.  DBT Central makes DBT practical, accessible, and personal ‚Äì so you can focus on living the life you want.
features: Educational Content, Talk Therapy / Coaching - Clinician, Other

name: DBT for Life
description: DBT for Life: Transform Your Life with DBT Skills  Living with intense emotions, self-destructive urges, anxiety, or overwhelming stress can make life feel impossible. You don‚Äôt just need tips‚Äîyou need real skills. Skills that help you navigate relationships, manage emotions, and create a life that feels worth living.  DBT for Life isn‚Äôt just another mental health app. It‚Äôs your interactive, supportive space for learning Dialectical Behavior Therapy (DBT) skills in a way that actually sticks. Whether you‚Äôre dealing with BPD, anxiety, depression, bipolar disorder, PTSD, or just want better ways to handle emotions, this app gives you the structure, tools, and encouragement to make real progress.  What You‚Äôll Find Inside:  - Daily DBT Skills Insights & Reminders ‚Äì Stay on track with practical, bite-sized DBT guidance delivered straight to you. - Expert-Led DBT Workshops & Q&As ‚Äì Learn directly from DBT specialist Diana Partington in live sessions covering essential DBT skills and real-life applications. - Interactive Community ‚Äì A space to connect with people who get it. Your community will provide you with loads of positive reinforcement for using skills. This is a space to share resources, insights and discuss everything you are learning about building a life that you love. - ‚ÄúShare Your Wins‚Äù Feature ‚Äì Celebrate every step forward, no matter how small, and get encouragement from others who know how hard this work is. - DBT-Based Guided Meditations ‚Äì Sleep support, self-hypnosis for anxiety, and mindfulness practices designed to help your nervous system settle. - Skill-Building Challenges ‚Äì Apply what you learn with interactive challenges to strengthen your ability to manage emotions and handle difficult situations. - Earn Points & Unlock Rewards ‚Äì Stay engaged, track your progress, and unlock exclusive DBT tools, AI-assisted coaching features, and even prizes for practicing skills.  And so much more!
indications: Anxiety, Depression & Mood Disorders, Bipolar Disorder, Trauma / PTSD

name: Jones Mindful Living DBT
description: Learn DBT Skills to improve your emotional wellness.  We provide live weekly DBT Skills classes of the four modules of DBT Skills: mindfulness, interpersonal effectiveness, distress tolerance, and interpersonal effectiveness. Get support through our amazing subscriber community.  Members also have access to our extensive video platform of DBT Skills, mindfulness, yoga, and other emotional wellness topics.  Members are also able to participate in optional DBT Skills coaching.  Start with your free week!

name: DBT Travel Guide
description: This app is meant for people with borderline personality disorder (BPD) problems who are following a Dialectical Behaviour Therapy (DBT) programme or want to start with such a programme. DBT provides tools for people with BPD to regulate their emotions and control their impulses.  The app provides information about DBT and BPD. The DBT Travel Guide contains more than 200 different skills and mindfulness exercises. The app can provide support in moments of crisis through its crisis section. For the DBT therapist, the app contains a ‚Äòthink of‚Äô scheme, full of practical guidelines. Furthermore, the app offers the possibility to write down agreements between client and therapist and to digitally fill in the diary card.  Privacy policy: http://www.dialexisadvies.nl/privacy
features: Talk Therapy / Coaching - Clinician, Educational Content, Other

name: SociEATy: Non-Diet Wellness
description: The SociEATy App will be your guide to building a healthy, balanced, diet-free lifestyle.  Created by a Registered Dietitian, the app uses an evidence-based mix of education, gentle nutrition, reflection, and support to guide you through giving up diets, strengthening hunger and fullness cues, breaking food rules, improving body image, self-care management and building a healthy relationship with all aspects of health and wellness that lasts a lifetime.  WHAT‚ÄôS INSIDE: DIET-FREE MEAL PLANNER: Learn how to fuel your body from a place of self-care to feel and be your best, healthiest and happiest self‚Ä¶ all with no food rules! MINDFULNESS JOURNAL: Our one-of-a-kind journal will guide you through learning how to listen to your body instead of diets, plans and rules. We even wrap up all of your entries into an easy-to-digest weekly summary so you can easily identify areas of strength and ones for improvement- making navigating your journey easy and crystal clear! SELF-CARE HABIT TRACKER: You get to decide what, when and how self-care looks for you. Use our optional ‚ÄúSelf-Care Cups‚Äù feature to stay mindful and reminded of your chosen self-care habits on a daily basis. GUIDED TOOLS & ACTIVITIES: We‚Äôve got you covered for everything from eating habits (mindful eating, food guilt, nutrition tips, etc.), to movement, body image, and mental/emotional wellbeing. Our Self-Care Toolbox will be your go-to for help in managing anything life throws your way! HUNDREDS OF RECIPES: Never question if your meals are ‚Äúgood enough‚Äù again. All recipes are created by a Registered Dietitian with helpful descriptions and tips to make not only fueling your body easy but understanding why and how incredibly simple! We‚Äôve got everything you need from recipes that nourish the body to ones that nourish the soul.  The SociEATy app was created by Registered Dietitian, Colleen Christensen (@no.food.rules).  If you‚Äôre looking for a balanced, sustainable approach to intuitive eating that makes it easy- this app is for you! A one-stop-shop to replace all of your other diet-culture driven food logging, meal planner, and habit tracking apps.  Privacy Policy: https://www.colleenchristensennutrition.com/privacy-policy Subscription Terms https://www.colleenchristensennutrition.com/subscription-terms Terms & Conditions: https://members.colleenchristensennutrition.com/terms-and-conditions/

name: Brighter Bite - Eating Disorde
description: Having an eating disorder doesn't have to feel hopeless.  Brighter Bite is a knowledgeable, resourceful, and caring buddy to help you navigate through eating disorder recovery.  _____  ‚òÖ Your Benefits ‚òÖ  ‚úî "Coping Chat" with 20+ Therapeutic techniques to help you relax during hard times  ‚úî Easily track meals and eating disorder behaviors  ‚úî Easily track mood and thoughts  ‚úî Gain insight with eating disorder assessment test  ‚úî Organize and filter your logs in an easy-to-view format  ‚úî Export tracked data to a shareable PDF report  ‚úî Gain recovery insights from analysis graphs based on recorded data  ‚úî Access essential recovery resources including knowledge, treatment, communities, and more.  ‚úî Build up your own resources to cope with distress  ‚úî See daily motivation quotes to put a smile on your face  ‚úî Completely FREE  _____   ‚òÖ Therapeutic Techniques ‚òÖ  We use ACT and DBT techniques to help you navigate through dark times.  Acceptance and commitment therapy (ACT) helps you stop avoiding, denying, and struggling with your inner emotions and, instead, accept that these deeper feelings are appropriate responses to certain situations. It assists you to accept hardships and commit to making necessary changes.  Dialectical behavior therapy (DBT) teaches you how to live in the moment, cope healthily with stress, regulate emotions, and improve relationships with others.  _____  Our Website: https://brighterbiteproject.wixsite.com/website  Have feedback for us? Go to [https://forms.gle/PN7J3RCLFRVejiZa7](https://forms.gle/PN7J3RCLFRVejiZa7)  Need support? Go to [https://forms.gle/d8HpMPPob28jAYf9A](https://forms.gle/KUsXTUQL9v3RofMB8)  Contact us at: brighterbite2020@gmail.com

name: Worth Warrior: help body image
description: ‚ÄòTo hit a target of worth takes practice and courage. Believe you can do it, keep trying and you will get there.‚Äô  Worth Warrior is a free app created for young people to manage negative body image, low self-worth, and related early-stage eating difficulties or disorders. Created for teenage mental health charity stem4 by Dr Krause, a Consultant Clinical Psychologist, in collaboration with young people, the app uses principles from the evidence-based Cognitive Behavioural Therapy for eating disorders (CBT-E).  Like all stem4's award winning apps, it is free, private, anonymous, and safe.  The app provides a range of helpful activities and information, based on the notion that through learning to challenge and change thoughts, emotions, behaviours, and body image issues underlying low self-worth, eating and body related issues can be helped.  By identifying these underlying factors, and monitoring them over time, you can also start to identify what your triggers and maintaining factors are and work towards making positive change.  The ‚ÄòChange the Story‚Äô section of the app helps identify negative self thought and learn how to substitute positive self-thoughts. ‚ÄòChange the Action‚Äô focuses on identifying negative behaviours and altering them. In ‚ÄòChange the Emotion‚Äô users are provided with alternative, self soothing behaviours to manipulate their eating and in ‚ÄòChange the way I view my Body‚Äô users are taught how to separate fact from assumption.  There is also a range of information within the app for users to learn more about eating disorders, such as the importance of regular eating and hunger, the health consequences of eating-related behaviours, and issues that maintain eating disorders.  The app also allows users to build a ‚Äòsafety net‚Äô of helpful thoughts, behaviours and people to contact, and signposts to help. Finally, users can monitor and keep track of which app activities help, record thoughts and feelings in a journal, and view daily motivators.  We understand the importance of privacy and so no identifiable data is collected in the app and no WIFI access or data is required.  It is built to NHS standards.  Please note that the Worth Warrior app is an aid in treatment but does not replace it.  Worth Warrior is the latest app in stem4‚Äôs digital portfolio of apps that use evidence-based principles to help young people manage the symptoms of mental health difficulties and disorders. As of June 2022, stem4‚Äôs existing apps (Calm Harm, Clear Fear, Combined Minds and Move Mood) have been downloaded over 3.25 million times, and have received various awards including:  - The Digital Leaders 100 Awards ‚ÄòTech for Good Initiative of the Year‚Äô in 2020, for stem4‚Äôs full app portfolio  - The Health Tech Awards Winner ‚ÄòBest Healthcare App of the Year‚Äô in 2021, for Calm Harm  - The CogX Awards Winner in ‚ÄòGood Health and Well-Being‚Äô in 2020, for Clear Fear

name: RR Eating Disorder Management
description: Recovery Record is the smart companion for managing your journey to recovery from eating disorders including anorexia nervosa, bulimia nervosa, obsessive eating disorder, binge eating disorder, ARFID, and compulsive eating disorder.  Our team are on a mission to re-invent boring and punishing pen-and-paper mood and meal monitoring homework by converting it into a rewarding App that you can count on.  With Recovery Record you can: ‚úì Keep a record of meals, thoughts and feelings from the privacy of your mobile phone. ‚úì Collect jigsaw pieces to earn hidden rewards. ‚úì Customise your log form, meal plan, reminder schedules and alarm tones. ‚úì Share your Recovery Record with your treatment team, so they can help you to understand your behavioural trends and triggers. ‚úì Receive and send anonymous encouragement messages and virtual gifts from/to 1000s of other people using the App. ‚úì Access 1000s of meditation images and affirmation messages.  Perfect for every stage of recovery from anorexia, bulimia, OED, BED, CED and other eating disorders.  Learn more at https://www.recoveryrecord.com

name: Nourish: Eating Well Made Easy
description: Are you trying to improve your health by eating better? Nourish connects you with a Registered Dietitian through telehealth, and gets it covered by your insurance!  Nourish provides personalized, empathetic care and a focus on sustainable healthy habits. A Registered Dietitian will help you build a plan to achieve your health goals. By pairing this evidence-based nutrition therapy with technology that supports you on your health journey, Nourish makes it easier for you to eat better.  With the Nourish app, you can: ‚Ä¢ Schedule and manage appointments with your registered dietitian ‚Ä¢ Chat with your dietitian ‚Ä¢ Track your macros easily with AI-powered meal logging ‚Ä¢ Explore healthy recipes ‚Ä¢ Order healthy, medically-tailored meals for delivery ‚Ä¢ Measure your health progress, including an Apple Health integration ‚Ä¢ Track your nutrition goals and health progress ‚Ä¢ View summaries written by your registered dietitian and the status of your insurance claims for past appointments  In the coming months, the Nourish app will launch additional features that help our patients eat better, including meal planning, goal setting, and more!  Patients that use Nourish report an average satisfaction of 9.5 out of 10, and love that Nourish is: ‚Ä¢ Affordable: 94% of Nourish patients pay $0 out of pocket ‚Ä¢ Convenient: 100% virtual - use telehealth to meet with your registered dietitian wherever you are, whenever it's best for you ‚Ä¢ Effective: 91% of people who used Nourish reported they felt happier and healthier after twelve weeks of working with their registered dietitian  Who can Nourish help? In short, anyone that needs help eating better! We have registered dietitians who are experts and serve patients looking for help with: ‚Ä¢ Weight loss ‚Ä¢ Eating disorders ‚Ä¢ Diabetes and prediabetes ‚Ä¢ General health ‚Ä¢ Emotional eating ‚Ä¢ Gut health ‚Ä¢ Heart health ‚Ä¢ Women's health, and pre and postnatal nutrition ‚Ä¢ Pediatrics ‚Ä¢ Sports nutrition ‚Ä¢ Vegan/vegetarian eating ‚Ä¢ and more!  Download the Nourish app or visit our website https://www.usenourish.com to get started today!

name: Eating Disorder Support
description: The Eating Disorder Support App enables people with disordered eating and eating disorders, and people close to them, to find useful information, self-care tips and links to support - all in one place.  Use the app to find useful information, get tips for everyday life and access support when you need it:  Signposting: Know where to go for help and more information Self-care: Know what you can do yourself to look after your physical and mental health Practical tips: Develop skills to help you handle challenging situations and everyday problems Health and support services: Learn to make informed choices about getting help when you need it Local customisation: Get local information and links if your area has subscribed to its own page Favourites: Use the favourites function to create your own personalised library of pages For more information about the app, please email knut.schroeder@expertselfcare.com or visit www.expertselfcare.com.

name: Ate Food Journal & Photo Diary
description: With Ate, tracking your food and health becomes simple and enjoyable. It helps you in appreciating your food choices without judgment and to focus on food's physical, mental, social, and emotional aspects.  Ate encourages positive reinforcement and empowers you to form healthier habits through mindful, intuitive eating. It also tracks exercise, feelings, and water intake for a holistic view of your health journey. Whether your goal is weight management or overall well-being, Ate Food Journal is here to help.  Embrace mindfulness, cultivate positive self-talk, spot your patterns, and find your groove with Ate. Download it now for a fulfilling and effective health journey!  The Ate team  ‚ÄúEpic food diary app! In just a few days I have more awareness toward what, and why, I‚Äôm eating... It‚Äôs totally changed my relationship with meals. Thank you so much!‚Äù - Angela   CORE FEATURES OF THE ATE FOOD JOURNAL ‚Ä¢ Photo-based and visual ‚Ä¢ A holistic approach to health - meals & exercise on a single timeline ‚Ä¢ Based on mindful and intuitive eating principles - No calorie counting! ‚Ä¢ Fully customizable - because we are all unique ‚Ä¢ Can be completely private or used with friends for added support   BENEFITS OF ATE BEING A PHOTO-BASED AND VISUAL FOOD JOURNAL: ‚Ä¢ Easy and fast to log a meal ‚Ä¢ Simple and a joy to review your meals through a beautiful, visual timeline ‚Ä¢ Encourages healthier food choices (Add some color [veggies] to that plate!) ‚Ä¢ Fun to share with friends for additional motivation and support ‚Ä¢ Easy to share it with your coach, if you are working with one  BENEFITS OF A HOLISTIC APPROACH TO HEALTH TRACKING ‚Ä¢ Connects food, exercise, and sleep on a single chronological timeline ‚Ä¢ Identify connections between activities and make adjustments (Late workout > late meal > poor sleep? Change it up!) ‚Ä¢ Encourages regular eating and improves awareness of hunger cues (Overeating? Understand why that's happening.) ‚Ä¢ Provides a holistic picture of overall wellness when combined with other health indicators  BENEFITS OF FOCUSING ON MINDFUL & INTUITIVE EATING PRINCIPLES ‚Ä¢ Improve body awareness and food relationship, and remove food judgment ‚Ä¢ Break free from diet mindset, and develop sustainable eating habits ‚Ä¢ Embrace food flexibility and guilt-free social events for an enjoyable life  BENEFITS OF A FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE FOOD DIARY ‚Ä¢ All our bodies are unique and work in different ways (What works for your friend, might not work for you.) ‚Ä¢ Listen to what your body is telling you and find what works for you  BENEFITS OF KEEPING YOUR DAILY JOURNAL PRIVATE OR SOCIAL ‚Ä¢ Honestly logging everything is the key to success. So if it helps, keep your journal private. OR ‚Ä¢ Share with friends or coach for support and achieve goals together   WHAT ELSE CAN ATE DO FOR YOU? ‚Ä¢ Customize Q&A and Reminders ‚Ä¢ Fasting tracked automatically ‚Ä¢ Track meal times and frequency ‚Ä¢ And much more   OUR PRIVACY POLICY ‚Ä¢ Ate does not run ads.¬† ‚Ä¢ Ate does not share personal data with others, ever.¬† ‚Ä¢ Ate respects privacy, as a top priority.¬†   MEMBERSHIP DETAILS Subscription Details Ate Food Journal features require a subscription and comes with a 7-day FREE trial.¬† Sign up for monthly, quarterly or yearly auto-renewing plans which will start at the end of the FREE trial period. This enables Ate to continuously provide new features and updates. Ate is committed to improving lives everyday.¬†  Subscription processing is handled by the Google Play Store. Your credit card will be charged through your Google Play Store account when you confirm your purchase. Subscription renews automatically at the same price unless canceled. You can manage subscriptions in Account Settings in the Google Play Store after purchase. Refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the subscription term.

name: Eating Disorder Test
description: This app presents the Eating Attitudes Test, a widely used screening questionnaire that assesses eating disorder risk based on attitudes, feelings, and behaviors related to eating and eating disorder symptoms. Eating disorders that can be screened for by this questionnaire include Anorexia nervosa, Bulimia nervosa, Binge Eating Disorder, and ED-NOS (Eating Disorder - Not Otherwise Specified).  Disclaimer: This test is NOT a diagnostic test. A diagnosis can only be provided by a qualified healthcare professional. Please consult a physician if you are concerned about your risk of having an eating disorder.  The¬†EAT-26 has been reproduced with permission. Garner et al. (1982). The¬†Eating¬†Attitudes¬†Test: Psychometric features and clinical correlates. Psychological Medicine, 12, 871-878.

name: Unprocessed
description: Neurture and Sweet Sobriety bring you: Unprocessed. An app that helps you transform your relationship with food using evidence-based techniques, AI-powered journaling, and guided meditations to overcome overeating, emotional eating, and food cravings.  Unprocessed is a science-backed app designed to help you develop a healthier relationship with food. Whether you struggle with overeating, emotional eating, snacking, or food cravings, our comprehensive approach combines proven behavioral techniques with personalized support.  Evidence-Based Approach  Our methods are grounded in research from cognitive behavioral therapy, mindfulness, and habit science. Research shows that mindfulness meditation significantly reduces relapse rates compared to traditional programs, while journaling practices help decrease anxiety and improve emotional regulation.  Key Features: ‚Ä¢ AI-Powered Journaling: Process your thoughts and feelings about food in a safe, judgment-free space with personalized guidance. ‚Ä¢ Guided Meditations: Practice urge surfing, expansion, and other techniques specifically designed to help you sit with food cravings without acting on them. ‚Ä¢ Habit Tracking: Monitor your progress and celebrate victories as you build healthier eating patterns. ‚Ä¢ Personalized Prevention Plan: Create a customized strategy to handle challenging situations and food triggers. ‚Ä¢ Nervous System Regulation Tools: Access over 30 science-backed techniques to calm your body and mind when food cravings strike. ‚Ä¢ Educational Content: Learn about the science of habits, cravings, and emotional eating through bite-sized lessons.  Unprocessed isn't about restrictive dieting or willpower. Instead, we focus on understanding your brain, strengthening self-compassion, and transforming your eating patterns through awareness and skill-building.  Join others who are discovering that a better relationship with food comes not from fighting harder, but from understanding deeper.  Privacy & Security  Your privacy matters. All journal entries and personal information are securely stored and never shared without your permission.

name: Recovered: ED Recovery
description: Recovered: Eating Disorder Recovery provides personalized support and expert guidance to help improve your relationship with food and body. Designed for managing anorexia, bulimia, binge eating, and other eating disorders, the app offers a comprehensive approach to recovery and mental wellness.  Holistic Support for Mind & Body Addresses both the emotional and psychological aspects of eating disorders, supporting overall well-being. Resources focus on body image, emotional eating, and mental health challenges.  Personalized Recovery Path You‚Äôll receive tailored support to meet your specific needs based on a self-assessment that outlines your current state of relationship with food.  Evidence-Based Tools & Resources Recovered gives you access to a range of professional tools grounded in evidence-based therapeutic techniques. You'll find self-help exercises specifically designed to challenge harmful thoughts and behaviors related to food. The app also provides in-depth educational content, including articles and guides that help you better understand and manage eating disorders. Additionally, you can listen to relaxing meditations and insightful podcasts from mental health professionals specializing in eating disorders. To help you stay on track, the app includes the EAT-9 self-screening tool, allowing you to regularly monitor your progress through self-assessments.  Key Benefits Recovered offers a comprehensive recovery program that supports you through daily challenges and helps you achieve long-term wellness. It promotes body positivity by encouraging a healthy, positive relationship with your body. The app also focuses on mindful eating, helping you reconnect with your body‚Äôs natural hunger and fullness cues.  Download Recovered: Eating Disorder Recovery and start your path toward healing. Your recovery is within reach, with support every step of the way

name: Intuitive Eating Journal Munch
description: BUILD HEALTHY EATING HABITS WITH MUNCH: YOUR INTUITIVE EATING FOOD JOURNAL COMPANION  Hi, we‚Äôre Munch ‚Äì your intuitive eating companion and food journal, designed to help you build healthy eating habits that last.  SEE HOW YOU EAT WITH YOUR PERSONAL FOOD JOURNAL.  Munch is more than just a free food journal, it‚Äôs your guide to understanding your eating habits, building a mindful relationship with food, and finding freedom in how you eat. Whether you‚Äôre exploring intuitive eating, managing binge eating, or simply looking for a better way to record your meals, Munch is the food journal you need.  **Why Munch is the best food journal for you Daily, Weekly, and Monthly Insights: Discover patterns in your eating habits with a food journal that grows with you.
